data.title: 1. Language: English – Page 10 – EPU
data.text:
"Doing The Most Good." In these four words, our mission - to feed, to clothe, to comfort, to care. To rebuild broken homes and broken lives. By walking with the addicted, we can lead them to recovery. In fighting hunger and poverty, we can feed and nurture the spirit.

Stone Soup Fresno‰Ûªs mission is to nurture leadership that will create positive change for Southeast Asian refugee families to move forward and find their voices and places in America.

The Central Valley Suicide Prevention Hotline is a free and confidential service provided by Kings View Behavioral Health and California Mental Health Services Authority.

Serving the following counties: Fresno, Kings, Madera, Mariposa, Merced, Stanislaus and Tulare Counties.

Our staff includes experts in the psychological treatment of children, adolescents and their families. We also offer a full range of psychiatric services, and we specialize in psychological, neuropsychological and forensic assessment.

We are a community benefit organization proudly serving the Central San Joaquin Valley with offices in Fresno and Visalia. We are dedicated to the safety, permanence and well-being of children in foster care. We specialize in treating substance use and related issues for Adolescents and Adults.
